languages.text: "Возможно, это как-то связано с тем, что они пригласили вас посетить их храм. Пытаются привлечь ваше внимание? Простите, я не силен в их жутких загадках".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, это как-то связано с тем, что они пригласили вас посетить их храм. Пытаются привлечь ваше внимание? Простите, я не силен в их жутких загадках".

languages.text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, это как-то связано с тем, что они пригласили вас посетить их храм. Пытаются привлечь ваше внимание? Простите, я не силен в их жутких загадках".

"Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."

languages.text: « C'est peut-être en rapport avec l'invitation qu'ils vous ont envoyée à visiter leur temple. Si ça se trouve, ils cherchent à attirer votre attention, allez savoir. Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, les énigmes de ces fanatiques me dépassent. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."

traits.locale_text: « C'est peut-être en rapport avec l'invitation qu'ils vous ont envoyée à visiter leur temple. Si ça se trouve, ils cherchent à attirer votre attention, allez savoir. Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, les énigmes de ces fanatiques me dépassent. »

languages.text: «A lo mejor tiene algo que ver con el hecho de que le hayan invitado a visitar su templo. ¿Quizá pretenden captar su atención? Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán, pero no se me da bien descifrar sus morbosos acertijos».
languages.original_text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor tiene algo que ver con el hecho de que le hayan invitado a visitar su templo. ¿Quizá pretenden captar su atención? Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán, pero no se me da bien descifrar sus morbosos acertijos».

languages.text: 「おそらく、それは彼らが陛下を神殿へと招いたことに関係しているのでしょう。注意を引こうとしているのかもしれませんよ？申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。彼らの不穏な謎の解読は、あまり得意ではないのです」
languages.original_text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく、それは彼らが陛下を神殿へと招いたことに関係しているのでしょう。注意を引こうとしているのかもしれませんよ？申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。彼らの不穏な謎の解読は、あまり得意ではないのです」

languages.text: “他们邀请您前往圣殿，或许这与您的圣殿之旅有关。说不定他们只是想引起您的注意？我很抱歉，舰长大人，我真的不太擅长破解这些那些令人不安的谜语。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."

traits.locale_text: “他们邀请您前往圣殿，或许这与您的圣殿之旅有关。说不定他们只是想引起您的注意？我很抱歉，舰长大人，我真的不太擅长破解这些那些令人不安的谜语。”

languages.text: "Vielleicht hat es etwas mit Eurer Einladung in ihren Tempel zu tun. Möglicherweise wollen sie Eure Aufmerksamkeit erregen? Tut mir leid, Lord Captain, die Lösung verstörender Rätsel gehört nicht zu meinen Stärken."
languages.original_text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht hat es etwas mit Eurer Einladung in ihren Tempel zu tun. Möglicherweise wollen sie Eure Aufmerksamkeit erregen? Tut mir leid, Lord Captain, die Lösung verstörender Rätsel gehört nicht zu meinen Stärken."

languages.text: "Sizi tapınaklarına davet etmeleriyle bir ilgisi olabilir. İlginizi çekmek istiyorlardır belki. Affedersiniz Lord Kaptan, nahoş muammaları çözmekte pek iyi sayılmam."
languages.original_text: "Maybe it has something to do with them inviting you to visit their temple. Maybe they're trying to get your attention? Apologies, Lord Captain, I'm no good at deciphering their disturbing riddles."
